rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception area that adheres to Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy.
Open plan living area with natural light, designed in a Brutalist style using raw concrete finishes.
Adjacent to the kitchen and connected to the living room for communal dining experiences.
Functional kitchen with exposed concrete elements, incorporating modern appliances while following Vastu guidelines regarding placement of water sources.
A dedicated library area featuring large windows for natural lighting and a quiet ambiance, in line with Indian residential design principles.
